Description: On I-95 South at mile marker 2.5 in the County of Greensville, motorists can expect delays due to a multi-vehicle crash. Lane closures exist.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Multi-Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 155.4 in the County of Prince William, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 109 in the County of Montgomery, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south exit 109 narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On VA-150 in the County of Chesterfield, in the vicinity of the ramp to VA-150, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The south right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 147.3 in the County of Stafford, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle
